W5
list1 = open('w5-2.txt', 'r')

list2 = open('w5-3.txt', 'r')

#讀取 w5-2.txt(修課名單) & w5-3.txt(實到名單) 進行比對

s1 = set(list1)

s2 = set(list2)

#將兩者集合

print ('二乙缺席名單:')

print (list(s1.symmetric_difference(s2)))
